nodes.text: The aunt of Karr Nuq Sin was a female individual. She died while Nuq Sin was a student at  on the planet Merokia, and his parents came to him at school to tell him. When Tomar and Looway Nuq Sin came to the school to discuss pulling him out of it due to his health issues, Nuq Sin feared a family member had died because his aunt's death was the last occasion they came to him at school.
Karr Nuq Sin's aunt was first mentioned in the 2019 junior novel Force Collector by Kevin Shinick.
